thread.title: Marcie Goodman
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Marcie Goodman

author: Marcie Goodman
title: Marcie Goodman
text: I have spent hours pouring over flourists that could offer reasonably priced stunning bouquets for my Sisters birthday. Most seemed expensive for small arrangements and held little in the way of fun additional extras. I am really pleased with the massive variety of alternative arrangements and the more traditional flower arrangements. There is no need to go elsewhere! Added to my favourites and now my go to place for gifts. Thank you xx
